You can find the answers below each question by clicking the button below each question. 5.7 Reading Code Consider the following Python program: x = int(input("Enter a positive integer: ")) while x <= 0: print("Invalid input!") x = int(input("Enter a positive integer: ")) n = x for i in range(n - 1): for j in range(n - i - 1): print(" ", end="") for j in range(i + 1): print("* ", end="") print("") for i in range(n): for j in range(n): print("* ", end="") print("")Describe the shape that will be printed when this program is executed.
